meaningMnemonic: If you can't stop <kanji>think</kanji>ing about how much you <kanji>yearn for</kanji> someone, that <vocabulary>yearning</vocabulary> can drive you crazy. Try to keep it in check, and enjoy how you can hold such <vocabulary>deep affection</vocabulary> for someone.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
